description:
Excellent all-around crampons for difficult mixed terrain, mountain travel and steep ice. Stainless steel construction keeps them light. The material is also stiff, durable, and resists rust and corrosion.

  • Versatile, horizontal front points are effective on hard ice, softer conditions and for all around mountain use
  • Serrated secondary points offer great traction on mixed ground
  • Versatile horizontal front points and technical secondary points
  • Low profile micro-adjust heel bail offers a precision fit
  • Fits on boots with a toe welt
  • Includes front and rear dual-density antibot system to prevent snow build up
name: Black Diamond Sabretooth Pro Crampons
